EmailTemplate.name: AIA_MockID_Card_Approval_Requested
EmailTemplate.subject: Mock ID Card Approval Requested
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please review and approve the following Mock ID Card.
Below is a link to the request. {!AIA_Document__c.Link}
Please review the latest version of all attachments to this record.
You can Approve or Reject this by replying to this email with Approve or Reject in the Body, or through the AIA Application.
